commits.msg:
puppet-rally: Initial commit

This is the initial commit for puppet-rally.
It has been automatically generated using cookiecutter[1] and msync[2]

[1] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-openstack-cookiecutter
[2] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-modulesync-configs

Change-Id: Id91076034a4a0ba17e454fa16473b050e167dcac

Add config file settings and tests for benchmarking

Due to the large number of config options, the settings have been
split up into their respective services

This will require a
  include ::rally::settings
line in the init.pp in a future commit.

Change-Id: Ia59dadbcaa5c27aa371bd17cc20574f32021b7d2

Use oslo module to configure oslo related parameters

Configure database, logging and policy options using
puppet-oslo module

Change-Id: Ic00ffa89c8701eb58afbae315a7120aa280e0a05

Remove deprecated 'verbose' parameter

Puppet-rally has never been released, so we can
safely remove its deprecated 'verbose' parameter.

Change-Id: I900f18ffafccec36bf2d4514e78fa098adfc67c2

Add support for the oslo db_max_retries parameter

The db_max_retries parameter regulates the number of reconnection
attempts performed after an error raised rather than at startup.

Change-Id: Ia02d5e1a60d42b7dcca3676253a76e8d1a852894
Closes-Bug: 1579718

Make class rally work

Class rally is created initially by tool, this patch aims to
update related class, packages and configs:

 - Use package to install rally
 - Add rally_init_spec
 - include releated classes
 - move openstack_client_http_timeout from rally::settings to rally.

Closes-Bug: #1582961
Change-Id: Ibc0b981f7114f0bb49a56f65ffdc1ce3283e63dc

Add purge_config option

Add the option in order to facilitate management.
User can ensure that only the options they hoped
are configured.

Change-Id: Ib886b2f41d5ecb048c22e8663a2bf7ba39019e27

Manage SQLite database directory

rally::db use sqlite as the default for $database_connection,
if user execute "rally-manage db create" command, then it will
fail b/c the database directory is not created.

This patch aims to fix this issue and add related rspec test.

Change-Id: I243efccc55c09fab4d5532aa0b578f94583dfc0d
Closes-Bug: #1583062

Add rally::db::sync

This patch aims to add class rally::db::sync to manage
creation of rally database.

Change-Id: Ibbf13ba335f7f0f70e4be6a2c037f924595eb082

Add example manifest

Change-Id: I53f539835b6f9b9240a820148b8a33f41c448f22

Add rally::settings::tempest

According to master branch of rally, parameters in [image] has
been moved into [tempest] section, some has been renamed.

This patch aims to add a new class to manage parameters in [tempest].

Change-Id: I5fd3f1ad294789cfab5612be47d741138b2a8102

Added retries for db_sync

If db sync fails, it is never retried leading to errors. So, this
patch adds retries for db_sync to avoid sync fails.

Change-Id: Ife3a9bb2851fd730dbd693bda18733ffdec1286e
Closes-Bug: #1628580

Remove unused parameters

The sqlite_package_name option has been useless,
so delete it.

Change-Id: Ibf1adc67235ddb5774eda5996408813b9df5c11d

include ::openstacklib::defaults in params.pp

The ::openstacklib::defaults is default configuration for all
openstack-puppet module. This file is loaded in the params.pp
of each class.

Change-Id: I72b860ae111a23da789c4e4916f597f31dc51f11

Add rally::settings::magnum

This patch aims to add a new class to manage magnum.

Change-Id: I3d78a99e9c4dae4a8198da933844d658eade93e5
Closes-Bug: #1645919

Add rally::settings::mistral

This patch aims to add a new class to manage mistral.

Change-Id: I3ef9ce12b575c7b6e59ec06071ff9ce017be7aad
Closes-Bug: #1645919

Add rally::settings::monasca

This patch aims to add a new class to manage monasca.

Change-Id: I2708bb32bc5007f5abe08f65779f2a90cfee697d
Closes-Bug: #1645919

Add hooks for external install & svc management

This adds defined anchor points for external modules to hook into the
software install, config and service dependency chain.  This allows
external modules to manage software installation (virtualenv,
containers, etc) and service management (pacemaker) without needing rely
on resources that may change or be renamed.

Change-Id: If6423151f75e384ac5539a848942e82fc4c8e95c

Add watcher parameters settings

Change-Id: Idbc4250d69b6e171970594fa55af7d00b6717e64

Add oslo::db to dependency chain

All db settings should be applied and all releated packages should be
installed before dbsync starts.

Change-Id: Ic5b27b858af41c51e83b09ccb0fe43d74b30ac4c

Inconsistent package_ensure parameter name

The parameter name used to enforce package state is inconsistent across
manifests and modules. I settle on package_ensure since it's already
widely used.

Change-Id: Id0e5a1864ed18a63bd1fb392b03eb8c22ae39acc
Closes-Bug: #1668732

Expose use_json logging option

It enables JSON-formatted logging from oslo.log.

Change-Id: Ie72a2b7af89bb6b5d2dd97e608288e1e90577024

Add use_journal option for logging configuration

This enables oslo.log to pass logging records to journald.

Change-Id: Iece77902f52cdfda3ae9b3bbf503d36ac4183aa7

Drop all qpid related explanations

Qpid was removed in Mitaka from Oslo Messaging, so we
can remove all qpid related explanations.

Change-Id: If26df271959c5aa240632f671eb8b611bc3304c7

Add 'openstack-db' tag to db-sync Exec resource

In order to make easy orchestration on all OpenStack db-sync, add this
tag so people can use this tag in composition layer.
A use case it to set some orchestration to make sure MySQL Galera is
ready before running any Exec with this tag.

Change-Id: I1eac69a6d62e38efe7705e637a54095c0a120ebb
Closes-Bug: #1755102

Add pool_timeout option

Add pool_timeout option to configure this value for pool_timeout with
SQLAlchemy.

Change-Id: I84f37d54f4064f2ca0a780548b6db6ebe6786e43
Closes-Bug: #1757581

Remove deprecated ensure_package option

Change-Id: Ic750e3905871bd7faad19ab764e7b762441a6304

Remove useless code for sync.pp

In order to improve efficiency, remove useless code.

Change-Id: I90226d9800e044986ceee226652f5cc2a506c8a8

Fix annotations

Change-Id: I0847166fffe8d84a3412cb0d2ae5f5ecffc02890
